function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delayed reaction to pandemic threat","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Early detection and response protocols","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, testing kits","People":"Global population","Owner":"Health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Downplaying the threat of COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced public awareness and preparedness","Mitigation":"Accurate and transparent communication","Technologies":"Media platforms, public health campaigns","People":"Politicians, media personnel","Owner":"Public health authorities, communication experts"},{"Description":"Neglect of certain Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) due to focus on COVID-19","Impact":"Compromised progress on poverty, hunger, health, education, gender equality, and inequalities","Mitigation":"Integrated approach to address both COVID-19 and SDGs","Technologies":"Data analytics, collaborative platforms","People":"At-risk populations, policymakers","Owner":"International organizations, governments"}]}
